title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, an error occurs.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, an error is encountered.
EB: The synchronization of a .java file and another resource should be successful without any errors or issues.
SR:
1. Open the project containing a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file and select 'Synchronize'.
3. Select the other resource to synchronize with the .java file.
4. Click on the 'Synchronize' button.
Expected result: The .java file and the other resource should synchronize without any errors.
